title: Shifted-01-17-081023-15-POP-403.zip
description:
Welcome to alternate firmwares for Popcornhour, NetworkedMediaTank OEM.

Let&#039;s begin with the obvious. If YOU chose to use this firmware, you
must remember that it is YOU taking the risks. You can not approach
Popcornhour, or Syabas with your troubles. You will not be able to
reach me.

The primary goal of this alternate firmware was to enable DTS decoding
on A-100. But we felt we might as well add a few more things.

Here it how it works, when you flash this on a A-100, it will become
an A-110. This means future firmware updates will be as a A-110. You
should hold back with upgrading to newer firmwares in case Syabas
decides to do something to detect alternate firmwares.

We have included return firmwares so you can restore your Popcornhour
to original firmware.

A-100 : POP402
A-110 : POP403
B-110 : POP405


Alternate firmware changes:

* DTS
* telnetd
* Network settings tweak
* FUSE loaded
* ntfs-3g binaries for mounting NTFS read/write
* Additional busybox26 utilities


If there are other changes you would like done, let us know. If there
are other player and model versions you would like done, let us know.

Good luck.
